name: Riparte il futuro
goal:
Riparte il futuro is a civil campaign aimed at promoting transparency and fighting corruption in the European Union and Italy.

Our aim is to develop a strong EU anti-corruption culture, which promotes the practice of whistleblowing and encourages the empowerment and the role of the civil society in the prevention of corruption.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
We promote transparency and anti-corruption initiatives in the EU.

Currently, we are promoting for the EU to adopt a mandatory lobby registry that applies to all EU institutions.

We have also has proposed that the Intergroup on Integrity, transparency, anti-corruption and Organised Crime, which we helped establish, develop a common European legislation to protect whistleblowing. Whistleblowing represents dangerous and risky work that is absolutely necessary in the fight against corruption and Organised Crime. This measure is required to protect people dealing with national and cross-border illegal activities around Europe.
